notes:
# About this build

If your dps arent doing that well, you're not dying too much and your team can't seem to finish off kills, this is for you. Keep in mind you still need to be healing ! What I like to do with this build though is that instead of DMG amp, I do dmg myself.

## Items

You want to pick  [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0)  because it increases your healing **output**.  [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf)  increases how **fast** you heal.  [First Aid Kit](item_0172eaaa-1902-44a3-b989-d12f0f7301da)  is so you can stay **alive** a bit more and regenerate your HP quickly during fights. If you prefer/are more used to it, you can grab  [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) instead, but 25 shields + faster regen is better in general AND you're gonna want to keep  [Weapon Grease](item_961ae72f-434f-406b-a89b-ab8efec806bf)  and  [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) no matter which survivability perk you choose.


## Items NOT to pick

- Literally anything in Ability Power. Anything with Ability Power is useless to mercy because her abilities are : "Guardian Angel" and "Resurrection". Ability Power does nothing for either of these. If you pick an AP build with AP powers later in the game, it makes slightly more sense but there are better options out there than building AP on mercy.

-  [Field Rations](item_46ae6709-1166-426f-bca3-97a538d3f089) :
You're not supposed to stay on the objective, you're supposed to stick with whoever is doing the most amount of damage.

- Beginning of rounds/Death perks:
It's not that it's bad but there are better options out there. (+ You're not supposed to be dying as mercy so if you're dying maybe put your money in survivability over death perks)

- Lifesteal/Ammo/Elimination perks: 
During the first round you want to play like a good little mercy so you can scope out the enemy team and then eventually build DPS mercy if that's what your team needs.

# About this build

If your dps arent doing that well, you're not dying too much and your team can't seem to finish off kills, this is for you.Keep in mind you still need to be healing ! What I like to do with this build though is that instead of DMG amp, I do dmg myself.

## Items

You want to pick   [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) absolutely 100% no doubt. You also want to maybe get  [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f)  AND/OR  [Mid-Air Mobilizer](item_760c1441-8cfa-426c-885d-8d0dec32e145)  . With this build, you're gonna want to keep your weapon power as high as possible.


## Items NOT to pick

- Literally anything in Ability Power. Anything with Ability Power is useless to mercy because her abilities are : "Guardian Angel" and "Resurrection". Ability Power does nothing for either of these. If you pick an AP build with AP powers later in the game, it makes slightly more sense but there are better options out there than building AP on mercy.

-  Purple perks :
I find that usually during the second round, you can get a lot more value out of building with blues and greens than having a single purple perk or a purple perk with some greens. (Even chain Evoker, which will be taken around round 3)

-  [Long Distance Wings](item_8b4bafad-c8bc-4c77-bbe7-798b03920c88) :
You don't need Ability Power and if you REALLY need GA Range (Which you don't), wait until 3rd round to get  [Caduceus Ex](item_9e7965ea-2abc-44a7-b042-950c6ad2fce7) .

-  [Aerodynamic Feathers](item_03d95229-b91d-48c0-b1e3-c8075b678ef0) and  [Angeleisure Wear](item_00b53ed7-0768-442b-a2c3-8d19608c9391) :
If you absolutely need movement, like you can't go by without it, getting  [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) paired with a green survivability perk and using the rest of your money for WP/AS is the more intelligent choice. You get more movement so you automatically get less Dmg taken, and you go a lot faster.

# About this build

If your dps arent doing that well, you're not dying too much and your team can't seem to finish off kills, this is for you.Keep in mind you still need to be healing ! What I like to do with this build though is that instead of DMG amp, I do dmg myself.

## Power

As a second power, compared to all of my other builds, I choose Crepuscular Circle for this one. It's also in the healing build so if my DPS suddenly start doing amazing, I can build my healing build instead.

## Items

You usually want to add  [Amari's Antidote](item_67e0b1c5-3bcb-4ab5-b818-5082e5706124)  around this time in the game to make sure if you're healing someone very low that they're up quickly and you can go back to doing damage. (For example in your ult)


## Items NOT to pick

- Literally anything in Ability Power. Anything with Ability Power is useless to mercy because her abilities are : "Guardian Angel" and "Resurrection". Ability Power does nothing for either of these. If you pick an AP build with AP powers later in the game, it makes slightly more sense but there are better options out there than building AP on mercy.

-  [Long Distance Wings](item_8b4bafad-c8bc-4c77-bbe7-798b03920c88) :
You don't need Ability Power and if you REALLY need GA Range (Which you don't), wait until 3rd round to get  [Caduceus Ex](item_9e7965ea-2abc-44a7-b042-950c6ad2fce7) .

-  General:
In all honnesty, in general, if you're doing the DPS build, you're gonna want to get as MUCH weapon power as possible. If you're dying too much, you can still get  [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) and/or  [Angelic Acrobatics](item_baad85fc-3da5-43af-ad9d-f17885f59aa5) , but in general you're gonna want to position yourself better depending on what DPS/Tank they have so you die a lot less. ALSO if your team is dying too much,  [Resurrection Rangefinder](item_99baffec-51b5-42e4-be61-e29f3de8219f) can be very useful, but ONLY if your team is dying too much because this is still a DPS build.

# About this build

If your dps arent doing that well, you're not dying too much and your team can't seem to finish off kills, this is for you.Keep in mind you still need to be healing ! What I like to do with this build though is that instead of DMG amp, I do dmg myself.

## Items

You're gonna want a big damage perk here. Like any of the purples listed, except for the movement ones that you take ONLY if you die too much.


## Items NOT to pick

- Literally anything in Ability Power. Anything with Ability Power is useless to mercy because her abilities are : "Guardian Angel" and "Resurrection". Ability Power does nothing for either of these. If you pick an AP build with AP powers later in the game, it makes slightly more sense but there are better options out there than building AP on mercy.

-  [Long Distance Wings](item_8b4bafad-c8bc-4c77-bbe7-798b03920c88) :
You don't need Ability Power and if you REALLY need GA Range (Which you don't), wait until 3rd round to get  [Caduceus Ex](item_9e7965ea-2abc-44a7-b042-950c6ad2fce7) .

-  [Aerodynamic Feathers](item_03d95229-b91d-48c0-b1e3-c8075b678ef0) and  [Angeleisure Wear](item_00b53ed7-0768-442b-a2c3-8d19608c9391) :
If you absolutely need movement, like you can't go by without it, getting  [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) paired with a green survivability perk or  [Angelic Acrobatics](item_baad85fc-3da5-43af-ad9d-f17885f59aa5)  and using the rest of your money for WP/AS is the more intelligent choice. You get more movement so you automatically get less Dmg taken, and you go a lot faster.

-  General:
In all honnesty, in general, if you're doing the DPS build, you're gonna want to get as MUCH weapon power as possible. If you're dying too much, you can still get  [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) and/or  [Angelic Acrobatics](item_baad85fc-3da5-43af-ad9d-f17885f59aa5) , but in general you're gonna want to position yourself better depending on what DPS/Tank they have so you die a lot less. ALSO if your team is dying too much,  [Resurrection Rangefinder](item_99baffec-51b5-42e4-be61-e29f3de8219f) can be very useful, but ONLY if your team is dying too much because this is still a DPS build.

You're gonna have to build weapon power more and more ! The more you heal the more you can DPS. The goal here is to keep everyone up while still being able to pull out your glock every now and then! 

You want to rez as often as possible, even a small useless backline rez ! That way you can get valk for 5 seconds and pull out your glock.

Again, you want to keep building WP. The reason Im not building Attack Speed with that is because I don't personally like doing damage with Attack Speed, I only get it when Im focusing heals like with my healing build.

If you need more movement,  [Blessed Boosters](item_957fd380-b7b4-40d4-8333-bb8c535ca931) is for you.

I'm grabbing  [Battle Medic](item_ccd0edff-4d57-4ac2-83a7-bab6ff0ffb2f)  here but if you still need more healing you can grab  [Triage Unit](item_fec0554c-2685-4b93-822d-bf0020e654b4) . Your attack speed grows so quickly when you're in valk it's crazy.
